page.title: 20CREDITS.
page.content:
In helping to compile this text the following credits are due. Pupils & staff of the{KING JAMES 1 {SCHOOL, BISHOP AUCKLAND. {1. Collecting data, class 4G. 2. page11 Susan I'Anson 4G. 3. page12 Carol Barton 3G. 4. page13/14 Lisa Marron 3A. 5. page15 Lynn Storey 4G. 6. page17/18 Mr Rodgers - Geology. Mr Jefferson-Geography. Janet Batie 4G. 7. page19 Gail Stothard 3K.
OTHERS. 1. page3/4 In discussion with the NFU Bishop Auckland. 2. page6 Mr Cowan-Manager, Seetley Bricks Ltd. 3. page7 Reg. Manpower Intelligence Unit, Newcastle upon Tyne. 4. page15/16 Mrs Tulip of Newfield.
